subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Marcus Denmon had his second straight strong game from 3-point range, this time making six and scoring 28 points in No. 10 Missouri’s 81-71 victory over Villanova in the Jimmy V Classic at Madison Square Garden.
snippet: Marcus Denmon had his second straight strong game from 3-point range, this time making six and scoring 28 points in No. 10 Missouri’s 81-71 victory over Villanova in the Jimmy V Classic at Madison Square Garden.
